name: DINIL RAPHEL
my_business: We, grace caterers have been in the industry from 1997. With this vast experience we are able cater the needs of any event or occasion we are challenged with. Yes we take each event and program as a challenge and finish it like champions. We have created a network of the best people in the industry . Here we thrive to achieve the impossible. We try to make every guest lick their fingers and we make sure no one goes home hungry.
top_product: "At Grace Caterers, our top product is our signature dishes, which truly stand out on our menu. We pride ourselves on offering tasty food that leaves a lasting impression, along with premium hospitality that ensures every guest feels special. Our experienced staff, who have been in the industry for years, bring a level of professionalism and care that makes every event memorable."
ideal_referral: Hotels and Convention Centres, Florist, events, Photographers/Videographers
top_problem_solved: In Grace Caterers' journey, we've faced many challenges, but each one has helped me grow as a leader. One of the most memorable experiences came in 2023 when BNI Kochi decided to have our own catering BNI members handle a major event—the BNI Kochi Celebration at the CIAL Convention Center. Seven leading caterers from 30 BNI chapters in Kochi were selected to cater to the 2,000 guests, and the event came with its own set of challenges. Despite the hurdles, I was given the opportunity to lead the team of 7 caterers and manage a huge menu. We faced numerous obstacles, but through teamwork, leadership, and dedication, we pulled it off smoothly. It was incredibly rewarding to see our efforts recognized, and I’m proud to share that our Executive Director, Anilkumar Sir, gave us special appreciation for our work during the event. This experience was a turning point for me, as it reinforced the power of perseverance and strong leadership in overcoming challenges."
my_favourite_bni_story: IFavorite BNI Stories: SL 2019 Opening Ceremony Catering: "One of my favorite BNI moments was when we had the honor of catering for the SL 2019 Opening Ceremony. It was an incredible experience to be part of such a large-scale event, where we were able to showcase our team’s dedication and ability to handle a crowd of that magnitude with ease and efficiency." BNI Celebrate 23 Official Caterer: "Another significant moment was when Grace Caterers was selected as one of the Official Caterers for BNI Cochin Celebrate 23. It was a privilege to be part of such a prestigious event and to contribute to the success of BNI’s celebration by providing top-quality catering for everyone attending." Bhima Jewels Official Caterer (2023-Till Now): "We are also proud to be the Official Caterer for Bhima Jewels from 2023 onwards. This partnership has been a fantastic experience, allowing us to cater for a brand known for its luxury and prestige, and it has given us the opportunity to showcase our high-quality service and food at their exclusive events." BNI Kochi ED Anilkumar Sir’s Housewarming and Personal Functions: "Lastly, one of the most special moments for me was when we had the honor of catering for BNI Kochi ED Anilkumar Sir’s Housewarming Function, as well as other personal functions. Being chosen for these intimate events speaks volumes about the trust and relationships we’ve built within the BNI community. It’s always a pleasure to serve people who have supported us along the way."

name: INDUJA RAJ
my_business:
An environmental designer and dedicated architect with a strong passion for sustainability. Began career as an intern architect at Buro Dap, a Colombian architecture firm, and later continued to evolve professionally with Space Extended. My journey has encompassed diverse projects, including significant involvement in large-scale government projects , hospitality ventures like spice bow, the extension of Vythiri village resort, and terminal developments, providing valuable exposure and experience in both tangible and intangible aspects of the profession. 
Later founded INSAGA Architectural Studio in 2019, focusing on sustainable and comfortable living. The studio’s work spans various sectors, with a strong commitment to the "Go Green" concept. INSAGA has expanded globally through collaborations with firms like Architekten+ Ingenieure-Baukontor Niederrhein GmbH in Germany and several Middle Eastern firms, delivering innovative and sustainable design solutions.
top_product: 1.Residential Projects 2.Hospitality Projects - Hotels,Resorts,Clubhouses,Retreat homes,Restaurants etc 3.Commercial Complex 4. Apartments 5. Customised Villas 6.Office spaces
ideal_referral: Individual Clients looking for sustainable and comfortable designed spaces of : 1.Residential Projects 2.Hospitality Projects - Hotels,Resorts,Clubhouses,Retreat homes,Restaurants etc 3.Commercial Complex 4. Apartments 5. Customised Villas 6.Office spaces
top_problem_solved: Simulation models for climate responsive designs
my_favourite_bni_story: "Each BNI meeting offers a unique 30-second introduction, and with a different theme every week, I have the chance to present my profile in 52 distinct ways throughout the year which I have to prepare. This keeps my introduction engaging and adaptable, no matter the time or audience."

name: PRINCE JOSEPH
my_business:
Peaceful Retreat in the Heart of Kadamakudy
Set amidst the breathtaking beauty of Kadamakudy, Nihara Resort is a sanctuary of peace where nature and luxury blend seamlessly. Tucked away along the serene backwaters, this hidden gem offers a perfect escape from the hustle of everyday life. Immerse yourself in the lush landscapes, wake up to the soothing sounds of nature, and experience the timeless charm of Kerala in an atmosphere of comfort and elegance. Whether you seek relaxation, indulgence, or a touch of adventure, Nihara Resort promises an unforgettable retreat where every moment is designed to rejuvenate your mind and soul.
Stay in Comfort, Experience Luxury
At Nihara, every stay is designed to offer a seamless blend of elegance and comfort. Choose from our thoughtfully curated accommodations, including Superior Rooms, Duplex Garden Villas, and Pool Cottages, each offering a unique ambiance to suit your preferences.
